title: Saishuu Chikan Densha (Midnight Sleazy Train)
synopsis: In a crowded train, strangers are likely to end up being too close for comfort. But for some people, being too close is a comfort. When a poor conductor witnesses the bizarre yet inviting ritual of anonymous train sex, he jumps on the opportunity to turn it into a business. Every night after the midnight train ends its route, he turns it into a rolling bordello. Get ready to climb aboard... the sleazy train is coming.
staff: [['Nagai, Shinpei', ['Assistant Producer']], ['Raika, Ken', ['Director', ' Key Animation']], ['Kitagawa, Masato', ['Episode Director']], ['Atelier Kaguya', ['Original Creator']]]
